Articles.Content:
Kerbal 1.0 32bit

I did a rocket with the new stock fairings which those worked as interstage, but if i don't deploy them, and i just decouple them, engine will still have the "Occulted" tag without giving me the possibility of starting it, even tho the rocket has staged. 

![Cu68Zsa.png](http://i.imgur.com/Cu68Zsa.png)
